name: A fragile hourglass of mercy (full)
data: It decreases the users strength pitifully.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users intelligence ILLEGALLY.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'hour of mercy'.
It needs to be inverted once so often.
The passage of time defines its superiority.
It will also enhance magical resistance if worn by an undead being.
